::KitKat::

She looked at him. "You will be given guns. You will be shown how to 
use them. You are a brave fighter.  You will make the enemy cowar 
efore us.  You will instill fear into the sparks of the maximals.  
You will be a champion. I believe in you and that you can do this. 
You just have to believe in yourself."  She gave him a confident 
smile.
"You will be just fine.  But if you don't want to be in the front 
lines, then I shall not force you. But I will find a place for you in 
which to fight with us."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Etchingar looks at KitKat in fear.
> 
> "Front Line? Uhhh, no! I mean, They have guns! I don't!" Etchingar 
said...
